title.narrative: Kiwa Initiative – Nature Based Solutions for Climate Resilience

description.narrative: The Kiwa Initiative – Nature Based Solutions for Climate Resilience (formerly Pacific Initiative for Biodiversity and Climate Change) is a French-led initiative. The Initiative aims to strengthening resilience to climate change through biodiversity conservation for Pacific islands ecosystems, communities and economies. The French Development Agency (AFD) will managed pooled donor funding, which will provide community, national and regional grants to PICTs and regional organisations (the Pacific Community SPC) and Secretariat of the Pacific Regional Environment Programme (SPREP), and International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN). Over €30 million has been committed by five donors (France €13 million, EU €10 million, New Zealand NZD1 million, Australia AUD 1 million and Canada CAD10 million).
